title: Gammadda V Force provides water to people in queues
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Gammada V Force members today (24) took steps to distribute water bottles to public who have been standing in queues to obtain fuel and gas all day.
Accordingly, bottled water was distributed to those queuing in Colombo, Gampaha and Ratnapura districts for the third day.

Bottled water was distributed to people who were standing in line for kerosene and gas in Thihariya in Gampaha District and to people queuing at Maradana Templar’s Road, Kirulapone, Flower Road in Colombo 07 and those in Kalubowila and Dehiwala.
Moreover, drinking water bottles were also distributed to people standing in queues at Ratnapura as well.
